content.en: Secure cloud outsourcing: Researchers have been investigating how to securely outsource complex computations to untrusted cloud servers. They have developed protocols and algorithms that allow users to securely outsource tasks such as modular exponentiations and matrix operations to the cloud while ensuring security, robust cheating resistance, and efficiency. These advancements in secure outsourcing enable individuals and organizations to leverage the computational power of the cloud without compromising the privacy and integrity of their data.
content.da: Sikker cloud outsourcing: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan man sikkert kan outsource komplekse beregninger til utroværdige cloud-servere. De har udviklet protokoller og algoritmer, der tillader brugere sikkert at outsource opgaver såsom modulære eksponentiationer og matrixoperationer til skyen, samtidig med at sikkerhed, robust snydemodstand og effektivitet sikres. Disse fremskridt inden for sikker outsourcing gør det muligt for individer og organisationer at udnytte cloud'ens beregningskraft uden at gå på kompromis med privatlivets fred og integriteten af deres data.
